#### Question 5

```{r, echo=TRUE}
fred <- read.csv("./distanceByAirport.csv")
data <- data.frame(fred)
IAHdata <- data[data["ORIGIN"] == "IAH",]
head(IAHdata)
```
```{r, echo=TRUE}
dim(data)
dim(IAHdata)
```
We see that we have taken a subset of the original data, where the subset is all the entries with an origin of IAH.
